00036 class Variables extends AbstractClass implements Iterator
00037 {
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00039 
00040 //--------------------------------------------------------- public methods
00041         
00056         public function GetVariableByName ( $varName )
00057         {
00058                 if ( isset ( $this->variables [ $varName ] ) )
00059                 {
00060                         return $this->variables [ $varName ];
00061                 }
00062                 else
00063                 {
00064                         $errors = new Errors ( );
00065                         $errors->Add ( new VariableError ( VariableError::VARIABLE_NOT_LOADED, 'Variable not loaded from database not existant.' ) );
00066                         
00067                         return $errors;
00068                 }
00069         } //---- End of GetVariableByName
00070         
00078         public function SetVariable ( Variable $variable )
00079         {
00080                 $this->Add ( $variable );
00081         } //---- End of SetVariable
00082         
00083 //------------------------------------------- Implémentation de MyIterator
00084 
00092     public function Add( Variable $item )
00093     {
00094                 if ( $item == NULL ) return;
00095                 
00096                 $key = $item->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME );
00097         
00098                 if ( empty ( $key ) )
00099                 {
00100                         $this->variables [] = $item;            
00101                 }
00102                 else
00103                 {
00104                         $this->variables [ $key ] = $item;
00105                 }
00106     } //---- End of Add
00107 
00112     public function DelAll( )
00113     {
00114         unset($this->variables);
00115         
00116         $this->variables = array();
00117     } //---- End of DelAll
00118 
00125     public function GetCount( )
00126     {
00127         return count( $this->variables );
00128     } //---- End of GetCount
00129     
00130 //---------------------------------------------- Iterator's Implementation
00135     public function Rewind( )
00136     {
00137         reset( $this->variables );
00138     } //--- End of Rewind
00139 
00146     public function Current( )
00147     {
00148         return current( $this->variables );
00149     } //---- End of Current
00150     
00157     public function Key( )
00158     {
00159         return Key ( $this->variables );
00160     } //---- End of Key
00161     
00168     public function Next( )
00169     {
00170         return next( $this->variables );
00171     } //---- End of Next
00172     
00180     public function Valid( )
00181     {
00182         return $this->current( ) !== false;
00183     } //---- End of Valid
00184 
00185 //--------------------------------------- End of Iterator's implementation
00186 
00187 //---------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructor
00192     public function __construct( BDDRecordSet $variables )
00193     {
00194                 parent::__construct();
00195                 
00196                 $this->variables = array();
00197                 
00198                 foreach ( $variables as $variable )
00199                 {
00200                         $this->Add( new Variable ( $variable ) );
00201                 }               
00202     } //---- End of constructor
00203 
00204 
00208     public function __destruct ( )
00209     {
00210                 parent::__destruct();
00211     } //---- End of destructor
00212
